title.rendered: Get Rid of Your Junk Car

content.rendered:
The process of getting rid of your junk car in Chicago doesn’t have to be long or complicated. At Aero Auto Parts, we want to take your junk car off your hands. In fact, we’ll even give you cash for it on the spot and tow it away for free! Here are the steps you should take if you want to get rid of one of your old cars.

Check for Personal Belongings

The last thing we want to do is accidentally get rid of one of your personal items. Your car likely has important documents and other belongings inside that you’ll want to remove before bringing your car to us. Check under floor mats, in glove compartments, seatbacks and other hidden nooks and crannies.

Return License Plates & Cancel Insurance

Getting your title in order will make the car-selling process much easier. It’s best to transfer the ownership of your vehicle to the junkyard. While this step isn’t mandatory, it will make things much simpler in the long run. Many states also require you to return your license plates to the DMV before officially cancelling your registration and canceling your insurance policy.

Find Valuable Components to Sell

Just because you’re selling a junk car in Chicago doesn’t mean there’s no valuable parts to the car worth selling. Remove valuable tires, stereos, GPS systems, batteries and other things you might be able to sell.

Our junk car services in Chicago could be just the thing you need if you’re getting rid of your car. We offer same day pickups and all of our payments are made on-the-spot. If you have questions about the process, please call us, we’ll be happy to help!
